articles.title: Pakistan’s great game in India and Afghanistan - Hindustan Times
articles.description: While Pakistan will continue to exploit communal faultlines within India, it will use the Taliban to secure connectivity to central Asia minus India and to formalise the Durand Line. | Latest News India
articles.content: It is a worn-down cliché to say that the 1999 Kargil war is a reminder to India that Pakistan can never be trusted. Can an enemy ever be trusted is the logical question to this surmise. On the eve of… [+5119 chars]
